Plot: A drama based on Jimi Hendrix's life as he left New York City for London, where his career took off.
Title: Jimi: All Is by My Side
Actors: André Benjamin, Hayley Atwell, Imogen Poots, Ruth Negga
tomatoConsensus: It's uneven -- and it lacks the primal power of its subject's classic recordings -- but Jimi: All Is By My Side offers a well-acted alternative take on the Hendrix myth.
